circumstances: While in normal cruise, both engines stopped. The pilot reduced his altitude and completed a belly landing in an open field located near Henderson. Two passengers were seriously injured while four other occupants were slightly injured. The aircraft was written off.
probable_cause:
Double engine failure due to fuel exhaustion. The following contributing factors were reported:
- Mismanagement of fuel, 
- Inadequate preflight preparation, 
- Intentional wheels-up, 
- Fuel quantity gauge erratic,
- Rough terrain.
